name: (SPARQL module) Wikidata: Which politicans did not die on natural causes?
description:
This preset requires at least Facepager 4.6. 

This preset fetches a list of politicians from WikiData that did not die on natural causes. Add an arbitrary node as seed node, e.g. "politicians".

See https://www.wikidata.org/ for further information. You can try out different queries on https://query.wikidata.org/ (paste the value of the query parameter).

Please be aware that expressions in angle brackets are handled as placeholder by Facepager. Thus, the brackets of the prefixes have to be escaped with a backslash.

Pagination is handled by the <offset> placeholder.
